testcase.name: User can search desired job post
testcase.system-out: Given User is in application home page and verify application header Search jobs in your area.passed Then Enter job title name QA Engineer and Job Location London and Distance up to 2 miles.passed Then Click on More Option button and verify the section is displayed........passed Then Enter Min Salary 40000 and Max Salary 50000 and Salary Type Per annum and Job Type Permanent.passed Then Click on Find job button and verify the Job Search Header Permanent Qa Engineer jobs in London.passed Then User navigate back to the home page and verify home page is displayed Search jobs in your area.passed

testcase.name: User can search desired job post 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is in application home page and verify application header Search jobs in your area.passed Then Enter job title name SDET and Job Location Reading and Distance up to 5 miles.passed Then Click on More Option button and verify the section is displayed........passed Then Enter Min Salary 35000 and Max Salary 40000 and Salary Type Per week and Job Type Contract.passed Then Click on Find job button and verify the Job Search Header Contract Sdet jobs in Reading.passed Then User navigate back to the home page and verify home page is displayed Search jobs in your area.passed
